attributes.action: Ensure that Speaker Michael Martin is not rewarded when he retires
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disgraced Parliamentarian Michael Martin is stepping down from his post as Speaker. If reports in the media are true, he is also due to be given a Peerage and a fat pension. He should get neither. He must NOT in any way be rewarded for what has come to light in the past few weeks. Please set a good example to the public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
